dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, so, um, did you catch the news about Jeff Bezos's latest philanthropic move?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, so, um, did you catch the news about Jeff Bezos's latest philanthropic move?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah! Like, the Amazon founder, right? Giving away a ton of money to homeless charities?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah! Like, the Amazon founder, right? Giving away a ton of money to homeless charities?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! He's, uh, pledged $97.5 million to two dozen non-profits across the country that are helping the homeless.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! He's, uh, pledged ninety seven point five million dollars to two dozen non-profits across the country that are helping the homeless.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On Tuesday, the Amazon founder ands CEO outlined his plans to give $97.5 million to two dozen nonprofits around the country that are providing services to the homeless.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, that's a significant chunk of change. And this is part of that bigger Day One Fund he announced, right? The $2 billion one?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, that's a significant chunk of change. And this is part of that bigger Day One Fund he announced, right? The two billion dollar one?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This is the first round of giving that Bezos will conduct as part of his Day One Fund, announced in September, in which he pledged $2 billion to help homeless families and create Montessori-inspired preschools.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: That's right! The one where he also mentioned creating Montessori-inspired preschools. He actually went to a Montessori school himself, fun fact.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's right! The one where he also mentioned creating Montessori-inspired preschools. He actually went to a Montessori school himself, fun fact.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This is the first round of giving that Bezos will conduct as part of his Day One Fund, announced in September, in which he pledged $2 billion to help homeless families and create Montessori-inspired preschools. (Bezos himself attended a Montessori school.)

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, interesting! So, what are these organizations gonna do with the money, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, interesting! So, what are these organizations gonna do with the money, you know?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, it's for things like emergency shelters, short-term housing, and even helping families transition into permanent homes. Each organization is getting either $2.5 or $5 million.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, it's for things like emergency shelters, short-term housing, and even helping families transition into permanent homes. Each organization is getting either two point five or five million dollars.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The nonprofits that will receive funding are located in places like San Francisco, Washington, D.C., and Omaha, where they operate emergency and short-term shelters and also help families move into permanent housing. Each organization will receive $2.5 million or $5 million from the Day 1 Families Fund.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's really great. I saw one, the Urban Resource Institute in New York, they're getting five million to boost job training, even in areas like coding.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's really great. I saw one, the Urban Resource Institute in New York, they're getting five million to boost job training, even in areas like coding.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: One recipient is the Urban Resource Institute in New York, which plans to use its $5 million grant to bolster the job training and placement it can provide to homeless families, with a focus on jobs that pay more than minimum wage or are increasingly in demand, in areas like coding.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and get this: that specific non-profit is in Long Island City, which, [interrupts] if you recall...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and get this: that specific non-profit is in Long Island City, which, if you recall...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The non-profit operates 12 domestic violence shelters and six homeless shelters in New York City, including one for homeless families in Long Island City.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] ...is where Amazon's new HQ2 is going! And I think there's another one in Northern Virginia, too, near the other new HQ.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...is where Amazon's new H Q two is going! And I think there's another one in Northern Virginia, too, near the other new H Q.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Amazon announced last week that Long Island City would be the site of one of its additional headquarters. ... Another recipient is Northern Virginia Family Service, based in Oakton, Virginia, which will receive $2.5 million. Amazon is building its second new headquarters in nearby Crystal City, Virginia.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yep, Northern Virginia Family Service. So, you know, a bit of a strategic overlap there, perhaps?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yep, Northern Virginia Family Service. So, you know, a bit of a strategic overlap there, perhaps?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Could be, could be. It's, uh, the largest sum Bezos has publicly given away, right? Bigger than the DACA scholarships even?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Could be, could be. It's, uh, the largest sum Bezos has publicly given away, right? Bigger than the D A C A scholarships even?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The $100 million in donations amounts to the largest disclosed sum of money that Bezos has given away yet. The biggest gift was previously the $33 million he donated to fund college scholarships for 1,000 undocumented immigrant high school students who live in the U.S. with Deferred Action for Childhood Arrivals, or DACA, status.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. This $100 million total, counting everything, is his biggest disclosed gift yet. I mean, he's still like, the richest guy on the planet, even with that recent dip in Amazon stock.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. This one hundred million dollar total, counting everything, is his biggest disclosed gift yet. I mean, he's still like, the richest guy on the planet, even with that recent dip in Amazon stock.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The $100 million in donations amounts to the largest disclosed sum of money that Bezos has given away yet. ... Bezos, 54, has rapidly become the planets richest man. He is currently worth $125 billion, according to Forbes real-time rankings. However, due to a decline in the price of Amazon shares thats a $35 billion drop since we published The Forbes 400 list in early October.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Unreal. So, no concrete plans for the Montessori schools yet, though?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Unreal. So, no concrete plans for the Montessori schools yet, though?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He has yet to come out with concrete plans for the Day 1 Academies Fund, for which he will create a network of Montessori-inspired preschools in low-income areas.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Not yet, but it's all part of that larger $2 billion commitment. He's, uh, apparently worked with a dozen experts to figure out these initial recipients.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Not yet, but it's all part of that larger two billion dollar commitment. He's, uh, apparently worked with a dozen experts to figure out these initial recipients.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In a statement, Bezos said he worked with a dozen experts across the nonprofit and government sectors to decide which organizations to fund.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Good to hear. Always, you know, good to see that kind of impact.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Good to hear. Always, you know, good to see that kind of impact.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. Big moves from big tech.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. Big moves from big tech.
